title: The Dream Keeper
description: Evelyn's family is still in shambles. Her sister and father are dead, and her mother is a kleptomaniac hoarder that is slowly knitting herself back together after the awful fallout from her daughter's murder. After being expelled from school, Evelyn is trying to get her feet back under her. But how can she when she is sure she is going insane? Her world is being taken over by her dreams, and the boundary between real and imaginary is becoming blurred. And the insanity is spreading. When dreams become too real, and you are lost and alone, what path do you choose? Book Two of the Four Part 'Dream Thief Cycle'. This is a young adult title with some violence and is recommended for ages sixteen and up.
author: Millie Michaels
